updateInfo.title: Restrictions B Gone
updateInfo.desc: We bypassed restrictions that stopped external content from being displayed. Assignments, course pages, wiki pages, etc. will all load content as Canvas would.

updateInfo.title: Whuh-wha-Wiki Page?
updateInfo.desc: Caravan now supports Wiki Pages, including showing locked pages on the dashboard. Check it out!

updateInfo.title: Thematic Developments
updateInfo.desc: PC too potato to change system themes? We've got you covered. You can now change themes in settings.

updateInfo.title: Cracking Modules
updateInfo.desc: Load as many modules and items as you wish, without any limits, with the same great performance.

updateInfo.title: Features on the Side
features: Lots of behind-the-scenes stuff for performance.
Preparations for mobile and tablet experiences.
Fixed a few theming quirks here and there.
